title: From Mastery to Teaching
subtitle: Sharing what you've learned with others
description: For those who've done deep integration work and feel called to support others. How to transmit wisdom without imposing, hold space without fixing, and share without losing your own practice.

questions.question: What makes someone ready to teach or guide others?
options: Having more knowledge than the person they're helping
Having embodied the work enough that it's become part of them, plus ongoing self-awareness

questions.question: What is the most important thing to protect when helping others?
options: Your own ongoing practice and self-care
